snippet.title: LIGHT OF MOTIRAM | Official Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Welcome to the official YouTube channel of LIGHT OF MOTIRAM! 

Join us on an epic journey as we explore a world of wonders and conquer survival challenges. Explore, craft, and make a living in the large open-world overrun by colossal machines. Defy the machination, survive with mechanimals! #LIGHTOFMOTIRAM

Be the first to catch a glimpse of our exciting Trailer, featuring the captivating music by Oleksa Lozowchuk. 

Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3319630/LIGHT_OF_MOTIRAM/
Epic: https://store.epicgames.com/p/light-of-motiram-094dff
Discord: http://discord.gg/LIGHTOFMOTIRAM
Official Page: https://lightofmotiram.com/

Subscribe and add into Wishlist now for more upcoming exclusive content and a gaming experience like never before!
